# test

```{julia, results="hide"}
import Pkg; Pkg.activate(".julia")
using cov19sim

function f(i)
    school = ThreeLevelPopulation(policy_bubble = SymptomaticIsolation(14, true))
    infect!.(school.individuals[1])
    steps!(school, 80)
    evaluate(school)
end

tbl_res = vcat(map(f, 1:50)...)
```

```{r}
library(JuliaCall)
library(tidyverse)
julia_eval("tbl_res") %>% as_tibble()
```
